overview: Tim Garcia brings more than 25 years of software sales, management and development experience in the enterprise applications market to Apptricity. Under his leadership, Apptricityâ€™s growing client base now includes three of the worldâ€™s largest organizations, namely Wal-Mart Stores, AT&T and the Department of Defense. Prior to Apptricity, Garcia held management positions at Pivotal Corporation (Nasdaq: PVTL), Compuware Corporation (Nasdaq: CPWR), Peregrine Systems (NYSE: HPQ), Sterling Software (NYSE: CA), and EDS (NYSE: HPQ). He received his BA degree in Economics from the University of California at Davis.
